mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select tb.* , rownum rn from (select * from board order by num desc) tb where rownum <= #{listSize}) where #{start} <= rn
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (num ,writer, title, content, regtime, hits) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{writer} , #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{hits})
